title: Technical Remarks and Comments on the UV/IR-Mixing Problem of a Noncommutative Scalar Quantum Field Theory
abstract: In this letter we will dicuss the possibility of a resummation procedure in order to cure the UV/IR-mixing problem of noncommutative field theories. The method is presented for a scalar phi^4 theory on Euclidean space. Finally, we sketch the idea of resummation for U(1)-gauge theories.
